snippet.title: Slask's Adventure [savestateless]
snippet.description:
This is the first completed hack from China.It's just released on 6.1 2020.It's coauthored by two Chinese people,Slask and Liuzijun.It's a very huge hack with 152 stars.Some levels in the first part is relatively easy but when you come to the last part you will feel that perhaps this is the hardest hack in the world. Course 13,14,15 and the last level(Wang 8's final universe)is so extreme that many famous speedrunners quit game after playing.No one has achieved all the stars savestateless till now.Some famous players such as katze got over 140 stars and that's so excellent.

However this game is very interesting before course 12 and many stars are easy in the first part so it's also good to have a try on it.Now the easy version has been released and that version is human feasible and fun.
